欧洲研究揭示了抗生素耐药性的稳定模式根据2025年4月3日在瑞士洛桑大学和同事的Sonja Lehtinen的开放式杂志PLOS病原体上发表的一项研究，抗生素耐药性倾向于随着时间的流逝而稳定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/european-study-reveals-stabilization-patterns-in-patterns-in-antabiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/european-study-reveals-stabilization-patterns-in-patterns-in-antabiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d627fba8-69f0-42b1-42b1-89a2-122640bfb313 Fri, 04 Apr 2025 02:53:06 -0400 European study reveals stabilization patterns in antibiotic resistance
研究：巨型噬菌体利用epi囊泡逃避细菌免疫反应在不断增长的全球趋势中，细菌发展了新的方法，以围绕医疗治疗进行各种感染。抗生素抗药性危机的上升在医院和其他环境中构成了重大的公共卫生威胁，近年来导致数百万人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/study-jumbo-phages-phages-utilize-utilize-pesicles-to-evade-bacterial-mmmune-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/study-jumbo-phages-phages-utilize-epi-vesicles-to-evade-evade-bacterial-immune-mmune-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c29de49c-fda1-49df-be6e-6551f36cff91 Fri, 04 Apr 2025 02:38:43 -0400 Study: Jumbo phages utilize EPI vesicles to evade bacterial immune response

国家量子计算中心启动洞察力论文，探索量子计算在医疗保健和制药中的变革潜力如今，国家量子计算中心（NQCC）发表了其第一篇见解论文，“医疗保健和药品与量子计算的融合：医学上的新范围”，探索量子计算如何在未来几十年中使医学和医疗保健的阶梯变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/national-quantum-computing-centre-centre-launches-insights-paper-paper-paper-quantum-quantum-computings-computings-transansymentransents-computive-transansentrys-potential-potential-potential-potential-inthealte-In-Healthcare-In-Healthcare-and-Harmcare-and-Pharmaceuticals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/national-quantum-computing-centre-centre-launches-inoghts-ingights-paper-paper-quantum-quantum-computings-computings-computings-transansransforments-transanspotential-potential-potential-inthealte-potential-in-HealthCareAreCareAreCare-pharmace-and-pharmaceuticals.aspxuticments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=273E1E6C-261E-4723-A8C9-14C5B4F28C60 Fri, 04 Apr 2025 00:32:00 -0400 National Quantum Computing Centre launches Insights Paper exploring quantum computing's transformative potential in healthcare and pharmaceuticals
$ 500,000赠款，以增强土著社区的数字医疗保健由于50万美元的赠款，在农村地区患有慢性病的原住民和托雷斯海峡岛民将受益于改善医疗保健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/24500000-grant-to-enhance-digital-digital-healthcare-for--indigenous-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/24500000-grant-to-enhance-digital-digital-healthcare-for--indigenous-indigenous-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45c2405b-11e6-4bde-becb-0f397420bbf4 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 22:52:03 -0400 $500,000 grant to enhance digital healthcare for Indigenous communities
影响mRNA疫苗功能的关键细胞机制显示由基础科学研究所（IBS）RNA研究中心主任Kim V. Narry博士领导的一组研究人员发现了一种关键的细胞机制，该机制影响了mRNA疫苗和治疗剂的功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/key-cellular-mechanism-aftecting-the-the-function-the-function-of-mrna-vaccines-reveared.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/key-cellular-mechanism-aftercting-the-function-the-function-of-mrna-vaccines-reveared.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A27D81E7-5272-4AFB-88C5-1634ECF2318F Thu, 03 Apr 2025 22:50:00 -0400 Key cellular mechanism affecting the function of mRNA vaccines revealed
研究确定了17个中风，痴呆和抑郁症之间共享的可修改风险因素与年龄相关的脑部疾病，例如中风，痴呆症和后期抑郁症是使年龄较大的一部分令人衰弱的部分，但是人们可以通过改变行为和生活方式来降低这些疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-indistifies-17-modifiable-clisk-factors-shared-bet-bet-streos-stroke-stroke-dementia-dementia and-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-indistifies-17-modifiable-risk-factors-shared-bet-scornared-bet-setroke-dementia-dementia and-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41E766E7-EF2B-4A4F-4A4F-AE28-EC5C5C5BAD6CAB Thu, 03 Apr 2025 22:46:10 -0400 Study identifies 17 modifiable risk factors shared between stroke, dementia, and depression
研究揭示了美国成年人中物质使用的复杂模式科罗拉多州安索斯大学医学校园的研究人员的一项研究表明，过去一年中，近五分之一的美国成年人使用了多种药物，这表明，与一次使用一种药物相比，使用物质相当普遍，更复杂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-reveals-complex-patterns-patterns-substance-uses-use-in-in-us-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-reveals-complex-patterns-patterns-substance-uses-use-in-in-us-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0A78019B-D507-4E14-BA7E-8F51B5ADA682 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 22:40:59 -0400 Study reveals complex patterns of substance use in U.S. adults
